document_data.name: Retinae
document_data.mainbody: '''Retinae''' was one of the twelve moons of [[Garden]] in [[Realmspace]].
document_data.Description:
Like most of Garden's moons, spherical Retinae was larger than its parent, with a diameter of {{SI|121|mi|k|long=yes}}. It received its name because of a large crater that appeared like the pupil of an eye from a distance.

Within the "pupil" grew a species of [[fungus]] that was useful in the casting of [[spell]]s and brewing of [[potion]]s related to vision.
